name: Watch Your Step (lew, iArctic)
description:
WATCH YOUR STEP

This game was made for the Brackey's Game Jam 2022.1.

It is recommended you play in Full Screen for the best gameplay.

Made by Lew and IArctic.

In Watch Your Step, you are an archaeologist making your way through a torturous tower with the goal of making it to the top. Legends say that an artefact with the power to save humanity lays there waiting for its sole retriever. This is you, this is your journey to save humanity.

However, previous explorers that have dared to try, haunt the tower and disguise themselves to trip you along your way. It is your job to discern what is real and not to achieve your goal.

Adventure through a tower of bends and platforms to reach the artefact at the top using the towers many defence mechanisms that it throws at you! 

Controls and Mechanics:

Space - Charge Jump

A / D - Charge Direction

Fake Blocks - You Will Fall Right Through as the Spirits Laugh At Your Failure!

Slime Blocks - Very Bouncy!

Moving Platforms - Takes You To Different Heights!

We would love to see your jump counts and times in the comments and discussions too!
